summary: Just makes Unusual Gems list a zero weight, since they don\'t actually weigh anything.
descriptionHtml:
Unusual Gems weigh nothing, and now they show that fact. 

I made this because I didn\'t realize that quest items don\'t actually weigh anything. If you somehow get them without the quest triggering, they will still weigh nothing with this mod installed. Since that\'s only possible if you add it to your inventory, most people won\'t actually need this mod. 

This mod is a nitpick, something to fix a pet peeve. It has no impact on normal gameplay.
author: Tamha
